trans-unit.source: Defines the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中資料項目與其所繫結之節點之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項繫結至資料來源，其中每個資料項目都包含多個欄位 （例如具有數個屬性的 XML 元素），節點會顯示所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目的 預設的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML 項目，該節點會顯示項目名稱，其中顯示基礎結構的樹狀目錄中，不過沒有非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You can bind the properties of a node to a specific field by specifying tree node bindings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定樹狀節點繫結，節點的屬性繫結至特定欄位。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object defines the relationship between each data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件會定義每個資料項目及它所繫結的節點之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control stores its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the tree hierarchy and the data source hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制存放區及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>屬性及套用繫結至資料來源建立樹狀階層和資料來源階層之間的一對一關聯性。

trans-unit.source: For each data item in the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control attempts to match the data item to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object in order to create the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 在資料來源中，每個資料項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項嘗試比對的資料項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件以建立對應<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 建立時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件，您必須指定繫結準則。

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: 準則表示當資料的項目應該繫結到節點。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性。

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.
trans-unit.target: 指定這兩者沒有輕微的效能改善。

trans-unit.source: A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound.
trans-unit.target: 節點深度指定節點層級取得繫結。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>宣告繫結`Name`和`ID`的資料來源欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性，分別的深度為 0 的所有節點：

trans-unit.source: A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料成員基礎資料來源中，指定資料的項目類型，但可以代表不同的資訊，根據資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料來源中的項目階層式資料 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面) 會公開<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，指定資料的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，資料成員的 XML 項目會指定項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use.
trans-unit.target: 當資料來源包含多個資料項目類型時，資料成員會指定哪些資料的項目類型使用。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>宣告繫結`<Book>`的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>樹狀目錄中，不論在階層中的位置中的所有節點的控制項：

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立繫結準則時，您就可以繫結的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>值可繫結的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繫結至資料項目的欄位，或為靜態值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至靜態值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用共用相同的值。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override a bound property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object by setting the corresponding property directly in the node.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫中的繫結的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由直接在節點中設定對應的屬性物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> class that allow you to bind a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data item.

trans-unit.source: If conflicting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects are defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 如果衝突的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>會定義物件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項適用於樹狀節點繫結，以下列順序的優先順序：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件定義，並相符項目深度和資料成員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines and matches the data member only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件，定義並比對資料成員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines and matches the depth only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件，定義並符合只的深度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines neither the depth nor the data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>深度和資料成員都不會定義的物件。

trans-unit.source: (This type of tree node binding is applied to all nodes in the tree.)
trans-unit.target: （這種類型的樹狀節點繫結套用到所有的節點在樹狀目錄中）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that does not have a match in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>資料來源中沒有相符的物件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item is then bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of the nodes to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目的方法則繫結到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>的節點屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> class also allows you to format the text that is displayed in a node by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>類別也可讓您設定藉由設定節點中顯示的文字格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows some example tree node binding declarations.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示一些範例樹狀結構節點的繫結的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Example binding
trans-unit.target: 範例繫結

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data source, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>樹狀結構中的所有節點的屬性`Title`和`ID`分別欄位的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: All nodes use this tree node binding declaration because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> properties are not set.
trans-unit.target: 所有節點都使用這個樹狀結構節點繫結的宣告，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>未設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>樹狀結構中的所有節點的屬性`Title`和`ID`欄位`Book`資料項目中的資料來源，分別。

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data item in the data source, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性的所有節點的樹狀結構中的 2 深度`Title`和`ID`資料欄位的項目中資料來源，分別。

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性的所有節點的樹狀結構中的 2 深度`Title`和`ID`欄位`Book`資料項目中的資料來源，分別。

trans-unit.source: Also binds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property of the nodes to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 也會將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>成靜態值的節點屬性。

trans-unit.source: This section contains three code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含三個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>以宣告方式來定義一個節點以及資料的項目之間的關聯性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects programmatically to define the relationship between a node and a data item.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>以程式設計方式來定義一個節點以及資料的項目之間的關聯性的物件。

trans-unit.source: The third code example provides sample XML data for the first and second code examples.
trans-unit.target: 第三個程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料的第一個和第二個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>以宣告方式來定義一個節點以及資料的項目之間的關聯性的物件。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects programmatically to define the relationship between a node and a data item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>以程式設計方式來定義一個節點以及資料的項目之間的關聯性的物件。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data that is provided in the next code example to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 針對此範例正常運作，您必須在下一個程式碼範例為 Book.xml 檔案複製所提供的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code examples.

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.%23ctor%2A>建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>類別。

trans-unit.target: 它通常用於動態擴展時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value to match against a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type" /> property for a data item to determine whether to apply the tree node binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，用於和資料項目的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type" /> 屬性比對，以判斷是否要套用樹狀節點繫結。

trans-unit.source: The value to match against a data item's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type" /> property to determine whether to apply the tree node binding.
trans-unit.target: 要和資料項目之 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type" /> 屬性比對的值，以判斷是否要套用樹狀節點繫結。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料成員基礎資料來源中，指定資料的項目類型，但可以代表不同的資訊，根據資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=nameWithType> object) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料來源中的項目階層式資料 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件) 會公開<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，指定資料的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，資料成員的 XML 項目會指定項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use.
trans-unit.target: 當資料來源包含多個資料項目類型時，資料成員會指定哪些資料的項目類型使用。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>宣告繫結`<Book>`的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>樹狀目錄中，不論在階層中的位置中的所有節點的控制項：

trans-unit.source: When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 建立時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件，您必須指定繫結準則。

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: 準則表示當資料的項目應該繫結到節點。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性。

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.
trans-unit.target: 指定這兩者沒有輕微的效能改善。

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立繫結準則時，您就可以繫結的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>值可繫結的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繫結至資料項目的欄位，或為靜態值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至靜態值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用共用相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點深度。

trans-unit.source: A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound.
trans-unit.target: 節點深度指定節點層級取得繫結。

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: 準則表示當資料的項目應該繫結到節點。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties.

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立繫結準則時，您就可以繫結的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>值可繫結的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繫結至資料項目的欄位，或為靜態值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied share the same value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，指定套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件之節點文字的顯示格式。

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串，指定套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件之節點文字的顯示格式。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A> property is used to provide a custom format for a node's text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A>屬性用來提供自訂格式的節點的文字。

trans-unit.source: The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }.
trans-unit.target: 資料格式字串由兩個部分組成，在表單中，以冒號分隔的 { `A` : `Bxx` }。

trans-unit.source: For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 例如，格式化字串`{0:F2}`會顯示兩個小數位數定點數字。

trans-unit.source: The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string.
trans-unit.target: 整個字串必須括在大括號來表示其為格式字串，而不是常值字串中。

trans-unit.source: Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: 大括號以外的任何文字會顯示為常值文字。

trans-unit.source: The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定的參數索引。

trans-unit.source: This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each node.
trans-unit.target: 因為每個節點中只有一個值，這個值可以設定只為 0。

trans-unit.source: The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value.
trans-unit.target: 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定值的顯示格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common formats.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出常見的格式。

trans-unit.source: Format character
trans-unit.target: 格式字元

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in
trans-unit.target: 顯示數值的值

trans-unit.source: Currency format.
trans-unit.target: 貨幣格式。

trans-unit.source: Decimal format.
trans-unit.target: 十進位格式。

trans-unit.source: Scientific (exponential) format.
trans-unit.target: 科學記號 （指數） 格式。

trans-unit.source: Fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 固定的格式。

trans-unit.source: General format.
trans-unit.target: 一般格式。

trans-unit.source: Number format.
trans-unit.target: 數字格式。

trans-unit.source: Hexadecimal format.
trans-unit.target: 十六進位格式。

trans-unit.source: Except for `X`, the format character is not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 除了`X`，格式字元不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified.
trans-unit.target: `X`格式字元會顯示在指定的情況下的十六進位字元。

trans-unit.source: The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: 格式字元後的值 (`xx`一般範例中) 指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。

trans-unit.source: For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需格式化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A> property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A>屬性，設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像的工具提示文字，該影像是顯示在套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點旁。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 影像的工具提示文字，該影像是顯示在套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點旁。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: When an image is displayed next to a node, the ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the image.
trans-unit.target: 在節點旁邊顯示映像時，當滑鼠指標停留在影像上時，會顯示工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property to bind the same ToolTip text to each node image, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性，將相同的工具提示文字結合至每個節點映像，您可以繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property to specify the ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性，以指定的節點旁會顯示映像的工具提示文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property to specify the ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性，以指定的節點旁會顯示映像的工具提示文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定欄位來自資料來源之欄位的名稱，以繫結至套用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip" /> 物件之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要繫結至已經套用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip" /> 物件之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 屬性的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A> property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A>屬性來指定欄位名稱，即可將繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: When an image is displayed next to a node, the ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the image.
trans-unit.target: 在節點旁邊顯示映像時，當滑鼠指標停留在影像上時，會顯示工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A>要繫結屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件欄位中，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性設定為固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性，才能繫結至適當的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像的 URL，該影像會顯示在套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點旁。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed next to a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.

trans-unit.target: 必須提供

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrl" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrl" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要繫結的自訂映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed next to a node and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: 影像會顯示節點旁邊，只要用戶端瀏覽器支援的格式可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等）。

trans-unit.source: You can override the image for an individual node by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定覆寫個別節點的映像及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>直接屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to bind the same image to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用這個屬性，將相同的映像繫結至每個節點，您可以繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When displaying an image next to a node with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrl%2A> property, you should also consider setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 顯示與節點旁邊的映像時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrl%2A>屬性，您應考慮設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 您指定的工具提示文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>屬性來指定屬性要繫結的 XML 項目是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>屬性來指定屬性要繫結的 XML 項目是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to link to when a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在按一下套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點時連結至的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to link to when a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點時連結至的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a hyperlink for the text of the node, instead of plain text.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項會顯示節點，而不是純文字的文字的超連結。

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以選擇性地設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，在其中顯示連結的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A> property to bind the same URL to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性，以將相同的 URL 繫結至每個節點，您可以繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定欄位來自資料來源之欄位的名稱，以繫結至套用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl" /> 物件之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要繫結至已經套用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl" /> 物件之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 屬性的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>屬性來指定欄位名稱，即可將繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a hyperlink for the text of the node, instead of plain text.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項會顯示節點，而不是純文字的文字的超連結。

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以選擇性地設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，在其中顯示連結的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>要繫結屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件欄位中，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性設定為固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性，才能繫結至適當的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied is populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否動態填入套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to populate the node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied dynamically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示動態填入套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property is set to `true`, the child nodes of the node that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied to gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>屬性設定為`true`，節點的子節點，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用至取得在執行階段時展開節點填入。

trans-unit.source: When data bindings are created by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結所設定的建立時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制權傳輸至`true`，繫結所建立的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Data bindings that are created declaratively have the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 以宣告方式建立的資料繫結具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings.
trans-unit.target: 使用宣告式語法可讓您控制個別的資料繫結的行為。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property does not require an event-handling method to be defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event, if you are using a data source control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>屬性不需要定義的事件處理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件，如果您使用資料來源控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control dynamically generates an event-handling method using the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項動態產生的事件處理方法，使用的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can still define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event; however, it will be called after the event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您仍然可以定義的事件處理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件; 不過，它會呼叫之後的事件處理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: 支援的瀏覽器也可以利用用戶端節點母體擴展。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, preventing the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 啟用時，這可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項來擴展以動態方式在用戶端上的節點展開該節點時，這樣就不需要回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關用戶端節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A> property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性，以指定的節點是否顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A> property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event or events to raise when a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在選取套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點時要引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.SelectAction%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.SelectAction%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property is used to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性用來指定選取的節點時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.SelectAction%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.SelectAction%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的選項。

trans-unit.source: `SelectAction` value
trans-unit.target: `SelectAction` 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 切換展開或摺疊節點。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>事件，視需要。

trans-unit.source: Raises no events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取節點時，不引發任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取節點時，引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取節點時，引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 和 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 只會展開節點，而不會摺疊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>的節點不會呈現其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a check box is displayed next to a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點旁顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display a check box next to a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示在套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點旁顯示核取方塊，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To provide multinode selection support in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, you can display check boxes next to an image in the node.
trans-unit.target: 延展的多重節點選取項目中提供支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項，您可以在節點中顯示映像旁的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is used to show or hide the check box for a node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性用來顯示或隱藏節點的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A> property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性可以用來顯示核取方塊，就更常使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property affects every node type that is specified by the property; therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is often used to override that setting for a node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>屬性會影響屬性; 指定的每個節點型別因此<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性通常用來覆寫該設定，讓節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ShowCheckBox%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the control is marked to save its state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含已儲存的檢視狀態值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state for the node.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的節點檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Saves the view state changes to an object.
trans-unit.target: 將檢視狀態變更儲存至物件。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the view state changes.
trans-unit.target: 包含檢視狀態變更的物件。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to track changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: 指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件追蹤其檢視狀態的變更。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23TrackViewState%2A> method has been called on a server control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23TrackViewState%2A>伺服器控制項上呼叫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is associated with a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標視窗或框架，在其中顯示與套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件之節點相關聯的 Web 網頁內容。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.
trans-unit.target: 在其中顯示連結 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 除了以底線為開頭的某些特殊值以外，值必須以 A 到 Z (不區分大小寫) 範圍內的字母為開頭，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Target value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 目標值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term><see langword="_blank" /></term><description> Renders the content in a new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term><see langword="_blank" /></term><description> 呈現在新視窗中沒有框架的內容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_parent" /></term><description> Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_parent" /></term><description> 呈現父代的 即時運算框架組中的內容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_search" /></term><description> Renders the content in the search pane.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_search" /></term><description> 轉譯 [搜尋] 窗格中的內容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_self" /></term><description> Renders the content in the frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_self" /></term><description> 呈現具有焦點的框架中的內容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_top" /></term><description> Renders the content in the full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_top" /></term><description> 呈現框架不完整的視窗中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the <see langword="_search" /> value is supported.
trans-unit.target: 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 <see langword="_search" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5.0 and later supports the <see langword="_search" /> target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer (含) 5.0 以後版本支援 <see langword="_search" /> 目標值。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性用來指定視窗或框架中顯示 Web 內容的連結節點時，按一下該節點。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control for the nodes to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>屬性覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>節點的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property, if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> control must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: 請勿設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>屬性，如果轉譯的輸出為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>控制項必須符合 XHTML 1.1。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。

trans-unit.source: When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: 在建立可存取網頁時，您應該避免使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>指向另一個視窗中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET 網頁可及性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to specify that the Web page that is associated with the root node should be displayed in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>屬性來指定應該顯示在新視窗中該根節點相關聯的網頁。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property to specify that the Web page that is associated with the root node should be displayed in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>屬性來指定應該顯示在新視窗中該根節點相關聯的網頁。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料，上述程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定欄位來自資料來源之欄位的名稱，以繫結至套用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target" /> 物件之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要繫結至已經套用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target" /> 物件之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 屬性的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TargetField" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TargetField" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TargetField%2A> property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TargetField%2A>屬性來指定欄位名稱，即可將繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性用來指定視窗或框架中顯示 Web 內容的連結節點時，按一下該節點。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TargetField%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TargetField%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TargetField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TargetField%2A>要繫結屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件欄位中，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性設定為固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性，才能繫結至適當的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定為套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件之節點顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed for the node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 為套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件的節點所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Text%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Text%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property is used to specify the text displayed in a node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>屬性用來指定節點中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Text%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Text%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Text%2A> property to bind the same text to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TextField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Text%2A>屬性，以將相同的文字繫結至每個節點，您可以繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TextField%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。
