trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件之節點的工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件之節點的工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the node.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠指標的節點上方時，會顯示工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A> property to bind the same ToolTip text to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A>屬性，以將相同的工具提示文字繫結至每個節點，您可以繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A> property to specify the ToolTip text for a node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A>屬性來指定工具提示文字，讓節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A> property to specify the ToolTip text for a node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A>屬性來指定工具提示文字，讓節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml.
trans-unit.target: 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Booklist.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料，上述程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定欄位來自資料來源之欄位的名稱，以繫結至套用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip" /> 物件之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要繫結至已經套用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip" /> 物件之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 屬性的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A> property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A>屬性來指定欄位名稱，即可將繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the node.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠指標的節點上方時，會顯示工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A>要繫結屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件欄位中，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>屬性設定為固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性，才能繫結至適當的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A> property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.

trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A> property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTipField%2A>屬性來指定屬性要繫結的 XML 項目是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> property is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string (""), **(Empty)** is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")，則會傳回 **(Empty)**。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a displayed value that is not displayed but is used to store any additional data about a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied, such as data used for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示的值，這個值並未顯示出來，而是用於儲存套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件之節點的任何其他資料 (例如，用於處理回傳事件的資料)。

trans-unit.source: Supplemental data about a node to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> object is applied; this data is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 有關套用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding" /> 物件之節點的補充資料，這個資料並未顯示。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A> property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property is used to supplement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性用來補充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>屬性所儲存的節點相關聯的任何其他資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 此值不會顯示在控制項中，通常用來儲存資料處理回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A> property to bind the same value to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A>屬性，以將相同的值繫結至每個節點，您可以繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property is used to supplement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性用來補充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>屬性所儲存的節點相關聯的任何其他資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 此值不會顯示在控制項中，通常用來儲存資料處理回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A>藉由設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to an field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A>要繫結屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件欄位中，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性設定為固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性，才能繫結至適當的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A>屬性來指定屬性要繫結的 XML 項目是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A>屬性來指定屬性要繫結的 XML 項目是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml.
trans-unit.target: 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Booklist.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料，上述程式碼範例。
